let me Introduce myself

Hello, i'm Emmanuel Sunday Akomaning, a result driven and a self motivated Software Engineer, who currently resides in Accra, Ghana.

Owing to the passion i have for programming and problem solving, after graduating from the University for Development Studies Tamale Ghana, with a Bachelor's degree in Computing with Accounting, together with the knowledge and skills acquired, i decided to take to Software Engineering laying more emphasis on web and mobile application. During my leisure time, I enjoy reading and learning new technologies, engaging in sporting activities (particularly football), and listening to gospel accappella music.
My goal is to improve upon my skills in machine learning (ML) as well as acquiring in depth knowledge on how to infuse ML models into web and mobile application.

These are the few technologies that i'm currently working with: php, Node.js, Express, python 3 : TensorFlow, Java (intermediate), JavaScript (ES6), Flutter, Vue, Laravel, Firebase, MySQL and MongoDb, HTML and CSS(SASS)...

Download CV

places i've worked

Network engineer intern @Kofridua Technical University

  • Managed firewall, monitored network and servers performance and provided performance statistical reports for both real time and historical measurements, ensured network and system availability and recommended network security standard to management. Assisted in multiple construction of virtual local area network.
  • Lead and supervised two other interns in my daily routine as a network engineer intern.

System Administrator @Ghana Airport Company Limited

  • Researched and acquired knowledge on how to operate a Building Integration System and then impart the obtained knowledge to the firefighting and safety officers for the effective and successful operation of the Building Integration System.
  • Taught and Trained some firefighting and safety officers in operating and handling the Building Integration System.
  • Helped some of the staff in acquiring basic Computing skills

Freelance Web Developer @DUIXE-TECH

  • i'm currently working as a freelance web and mobile developer and i'm also open to Job offers.

A web app for getting weather information in major towns and cities around the world. The app displays the name of the city, current time, temperature(in celcius) and the weather condition.
